House Bill/Resolution NO. PS00049
FULL TITLE : WATER PROBLEM IN SAN JOSE DEL MONTE
SHORT TITLE : Water Shortage
ABSTRACT : Rep. Robes delved into the current water crisis affecting her Lone District in Bulacan which has been waterless for the past six days. She then commented on the ineptitude of the city’s local water district in addressing the problem. She said that the San Jose Del Monte City Water District’s (SJDMCWD) plan to resort to borrowings will only result in the increase of the very high water charges that her constituents were already suffering from despite inefficient water services. As she complained about the SJDMCWD’s lack of social responsibility, she discussed the contributory factors to the water crisis... Thereupon, Rep. Robes asked the national government to allow more private concessionaires to enter San Jose Del Monte City and to enact legislations to check the operations of local water districts... (House Journal No.13,p.13)
